extendedInfo.description: Drivebook presents the cheapest theory test practice tool in android. This application contains 970+ questions in 14 topics. Practice these questions you are certain to pass the test.PLEASE USE WI-FI TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP, ALSO LET US KNOW YOUR OPINION ON THE APP.PREPARE BY TOPICS:================== 1. Accidents 2. Alertness 3. Attitude 4. Documents 5. Hazard Awareness 6. Motorway Rules 7. Other Types of Vehicle 8. Road and Traffic Signs 9. Rules of the Road10. Safety Margins11. Safety and Your Vehicle12. Vehicle Handling13. Vehicle Loading14. Vulnerable Road UsersTEST MODE:=========Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented using the DSA formula from each topic.RESULTS:========Your past results can be viewed on the device to monitor the progress.EXPLANATION :=============Correct answers can be viewed in the practice mode and  has a detailed explanation.Copyright Info:â¢ Crown copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driving Standards Agency and the controller of HMSO which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.â¢ The questions are valid for theory tests taken after September 2010

reviews.title: Very annoying!!!
reviews.comment: I got two motorola atrix...app doesnt work properly and feedback from test is always wrong even if youve got the right answer...most annoying bit is when you know you answered it right and when time toand check for result it shows youve chosen different answer so you got answer wrong..and 50 is always wrong for some reason annoying!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Theory Test App
reviews.comment: I downloaded free version of this app and realised straight away that it had the potential to really help me prepare for my theory test. The app offers a wide variety of practice material, and covers many individual topics.
reviews.author: Lorna Allan

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its a good app. Demo is repetitive though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs more work, still fit for purpose.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great ap but keeps closing randomly on HTC desire.very annoying .please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Last question on test is always marked wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Passed my Theory test last week thanks to this app. Especially good after the last update. Worked brilliantly on my HTC Desire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Learnt with this app for over a week and passed my theory test! Thankyou Installed on my galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!!
reviews.comment: I used this Apps and passed my theory test.
reviews.author: Busayo Lawal

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Amazing app past my theory today 49 out of 50 :)

reviews.comment: Omg this is the most crapist app ever total waste of money keeps restarting the questions Grr please sort it

reviews.comment: Very good exactly what I wanted.

reviews.comment: Great app, I passed my theory test using this app for revision.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, however would be better if it advised of which questions are answered incorrectly in a test!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Continuing problems with the faulty test marking. Constant 0/50 scores despite correct answers. Not helpful.
